page.title: 18Chilton Farms-Churn,Prospect
page.content: Mrs.Cockburn has owned{Churn Farm} since 1969.11 people are employed there The farm covers 1700 acres of arable land,and produces cereals,sheep and pigs.The farm has a large amount of machinery;2 combine harvesters,2 drills 9 tractors, 1 sprayer, 3 cultivators, 1 van,3 pick-up trucks and some smaller items.The crops grown are wheat,beans, barley and grass.There is a large pig unit for breeding pigs, and facilities for indoor lambing, as well as 4 large storage barns.She has a small housing estate for her workers. Mr.Richardson began farming{Prospect Farm}in 1953.It is an arable farm of 286 acres, plus 15 acres of an old railway cutting. He employs 1 man full-time and 3 people part-time.He has 33 machines for different jobs on the farm. He grows wheat, barley, oil seed rape, clover and hay.
